title: Using iMac
body: Hey, I was wanting to know how is the new 27" 5k iMac with LOL? I know it isn't good for gaming but I only play LOL so I want to know how it copes, any lags, bugs, or even if it's got any benefits?

replies.body: My iMac is 2012 model. It was top of the line graphics cards, RAM (36gb), etc when I bought it. League runs great. The Mac league client gives some OS X users a hard time though. you may want to google to know of them in advance
